messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: comebacks for teens
messages.msgSnippet: I thought of a comeback for kids to use to other kids. One could say something like Yeah, but I can go to school later if I want to.   You can t be
messages.messageBody:
I thought of a comeback for kids to use to other kids.

One could say something like "Yeah, but I can go to school later if I want
to. You can't be homeschooled later."

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: comebacks for teens
messages.msgSnippet: I have to admit, I had to look this up!  I had never heard of autodidactic before!!!   ... autodidactic.
messages.messageBody:
I have to admit, I had to look this up! I had never heard of "autodidactic" before!!! <grin!>


>>> I actually have a bumper sticker that says "I can't go to school, I'm
autodidactic."

messages.subject: re: comebacks for teens
messages.msgSnippet: I actually have a bumper sticker that says I can t go to school, I m autodidactic.  They probably make t-shirts too.  My van is in the shop now so I can t
messages.messageBody:
I actually have a bumper sticker that says "I can't go to school, I'm
autodidactic." They probably make t-shirts too. My van is in the
shop now so I can't look where I got it from but I will let you know
when I get my van back.

Heidi
